item.title: A Hacker's Arsenal
item.description:
How the Heck Do Hackers Stay Undetected for So Long?

This blog dives into how hackers manage to stay under the radar, exploring the tools and techniques they use to stay anonymous.

1. OpSec

The first step to staying anonymous is all about physical security. Operational security (OpSec) is a process of preventing sensitive information from slipping into the wrong hands. Hackers, like anyone else concerned with security, have to think like their enemiesâ€”identifying potential leaks and vulnerabilities.
